about_the_game:
To play Burnit Quest you must first download the Fit Controller app on your phone!

A Mobile-Enhanced Fitness Platformer for 1 to 2 Players!


An immersive fitness experience

In Burnit Quest you will use your controller's movement to transfer actual exercise data. Making up for a fun and engaging fitness experience!

Couch co-op and versus modes

Working out with friends is always better! Grab a friend and get ready to work out in good company in the co-op campaign.
Or face each other in the various versus modes, and find out who is the mightiest!

40 unique stages

Explore Pok island in 8 different environments that, and face all kinds of challenges that require different types of exercise to beat!
  • Underwater stages: Swim by doing jumping jacks..
  • Platforming stages: Move by running, attack with punches and squat to perform jumps!
  • Slingshot stages: Use sit ups to operate a giant slingshot
  • Fishing mini game: Squat to throw the line and lure the fish!

8 terrifying bosses

Face fierce enemies each with their unique pattern and weakness.
Are you fit enough to beat them?

Skills to master

Get in shape in life and in the game. Improve your speed, attack and more by investing in up to 22 different skills!

Exercise log

This exergame tracks of your fitness progress, high scores, current and previous session in order to keep you motivated to improve!
detailed_description:
To play Burnit Quest you must first download the Fit Controller app on your phone!

A Mobile-Enhanced Fitness Platformer for 1 to 2 Players!


An immersive fitness experience

In Burnit Quest you will use your controller's movement to transfer actual exercise data. Making up for a fun and engaging fitness experience!

Couch co-op and versus modes

Working out with friends is always better! Grab a friend and get ready to work out in good company in the co-op campaign.
Or face each other in the various versus modes, and find out who is the mightiest!

40 unique stages

Explore Pok island in 8 different environments that, and face all kinds of challenges that require different types of exercise to beat!
  • Underwater stages: Swim by doing jumping jacks..
  • Platforming stages: Move by running, attack with punches and squat to perform jumps!
  • Slingshot stages: Use sit ups to operate a giant slingshot
  • Fishing mini game: Squat to throw the line and lure the fish!

8 terrifying bosses

Face fierce enemies each with their unique pattern and weakness.
Are you fit enough to beat them?

Skills to master

Get in shape in life and in the game. Improve your speed, attack and more by investing in up to 22 different skills!

Exercise log

This exergame tracks of your fitness progress, high scores, current and previous session in order to keep you motivated to improve!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS, Ubuntu 12.04 or later, or otherwise compatible Linux distribution.
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with 256 MB shared or dedicated RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS, Ubuntu 12.04 or later, or otherwise compatible Linux distribution.
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with 256 MB shared or dedicated RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Snow Leopard 10.6.3 or later
  • Processor: Intel Mac
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with 256 MB shared or dedicated RAM (ATI or NVIDIA)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Snow Leopard 10.6.3 or later
  • Processor: Intel Mac
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with 256 MB shared or dedicated RAM (ATI or NVIDIA)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

name: Burnit Quest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible video card with shader model 3.0 supportcards may not work. Shader Model 3.0 required
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
  • Additional Notes: Controllers need to be downloaded externally on a Android/iOs smartphone. A good WiFi network is recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® 9600GT or ATI Radeon™ HD 5000+ or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
  • Additional Notes: Controllers need to be downloaded externally on a Android/iOs smartphone. A good WiFi network is recommended.

bbfc.descriptors:
No violence, nudity, profanity or any kind of mention of drugs.
This is a simple 2D platformer with RPG elements focused on exercising.

short_description: Blast baddies and burn calories! Burnit Quest is a mobile enhanced fitness platformer, connect your phone to your PC to and get ready to sweat!
